Literature.Title: Sublichenin, a new subtilin-like lantibiotics of probiotic bacterium Bacillus licheniformis MCC 2512T with antibacterial activity
Literature.Author: Halami PM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pediococcus acidilactici MCC 2972(MIC=1.5µg/ml),Enterococcus durans(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=0.25-0.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis MCC 2773(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MCC 2763(MIC=0.75µg/ml),Enterococcus avium(MIC=1.5µg/ml),Enterococcus cecorum(MIC=1.5µg/ml),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum MCC 2774(MIC=0.75µg/ml),Kocuria rhizophila ATCC 9341(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes Scot A(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 96(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=10µg/ml)
